thread.title: Excellent hotel near famous attractions
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel near famous attractions - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: enesco1
title: Excellent hotel near famous attractions
text:
My husband and I, we stayed here for 3 nights last week.
Hotel is easy to find, right near the Lambeth North Tube Station and close to most of London's great attractions.
Room is rather small, but ok for my point of view, clean, warm and smells nice.
Bathroom is also clean, hot water all the time, but the door should have better insulation from the bedroom.
Staff was nice and helpful. Thank you Joanna and Christian!
